Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:41:58 +0000 Don't leave studying all to the last minute - cramming isn't an effective way to learn.

Body found in water at Eastbourne confirmed as missing pensioner Terrence Jameson https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-found-in-water-at-eastbourne-confirmed-as-missing-pensioner-terrence-jameson/FJYA6WDHMZGQZDGEP36RJEWCJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/body-found-in-water-at-eastbourne-confirmed-as-missing-pensioner-terrence-jameson/FJYA6WDHMZGQZDGEP36RJEWCJA/ Georgina CampbellThe 74-year-old had been missing since Friday after last being seen on a walking track. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:31:50 +0000 Terrence Jameson, 74, had been missing since Friday morning. Photo / Police
Reopening date of SH1 highway over Mangamuka Gorge confirmed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/early-christmas-present-for-far-north-with-reopening-of-highway-over-mangamuka-gorge-confirmed/BYTKS2KQU5D2VEM45JYOYSZP3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/early-christmas-present-for-far-north-with-reopening-of-highway-over-mangamuka-gorge-confirmed/BYTKS2KQU5D2VEM45JYOYSZP3Q/ Mike DinsdaleAn event of some sort will be held to coincide with the opening. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:20:45 +0000 One of the massive slips that closed SH1 over the Mangamukas for two years. The road will finally reopen on December 20.
Gisborne Girls’ High student awarded Peggy Ericson She Shed Scholarship for documentary photography https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-girls-high-student-awarded-peggy-ericson-she-shed-scholarship-for-documentary-photography/QEV3KSS3FNHQJKZ2UGIOWISV6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-girls-high-student-awarded-peggy-ericson-she-shed-scholarship-for-documentary-photography/QEV3KSS3FNHQJKZ2UGIOWISV6I/ Lasike's photography showcases Tongan culture and family moments 'with integrity'. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:14:12 +0000 She Shed Scholarship 2024 winner Mapu Lasike with artist and She Shed committee member Holly Howman-Evans (left) and Gisborne Girls' High School head of art Justine Ward. Some examples of Lasike's work are presented on the desk in the foreground.

Four vehicles impounded at Tribesman gang event in South Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/four-vehicles-imounded-at-tribesman-gang-event-in-south-auckland/VKSLCNUBGJCVPAO4BQCL7Y6VIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/four-vehicles-imounded-at-tribesman-gang-event-in-south-auckland/VKSLCNUBGJCVPAO4BQCL7Y6VIE/ Raphael FranksInspector Rakana Cook says cops will be following up on others involved in the event. Tue, 29 Oct 2024 01:58:45 +0000 Inspector Rakana Cook says the impounding of four vehicles after a Tribesman event was part of an effort by “a number of teams work[ing] across the long weekend to target and disrupt unlawful gang-related activity”. Photo / NZME
